statements.query: MATCH (n:GitHubRepository) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (n:GitHubBranch) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (n:ProgrammingLanguage) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (n:PythonLibrary) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:GitHubBranch)-[r:BRANCH]->(:GitHubRepository) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:GitHubOrganization)-[r:OWNER]->(:GitHubRepository) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:GitHubRepository)-[r:LANGUAGE]->(:ProgrammingLanguage) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:GitHubRepository)-[r:REQUIRES]->(:PythonLibrary) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
